Question.Subject: Copy and Paste from Firefox Randomly Stopped Working?
Question.Content: Since yesterday, I have not been able to copy and paste anything from the internet to Microsoft Word. It just suddenly stopped working, and it is driving me crazy!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Try Paste Special.
In Microsoft Word versions prior to Word 2007:
1.Click the Edit->Paste Special menu item. 2.Select Unformatted Text in the As list box. 3.Click OK.
In Word 2007:
1.Press ALT/CTRL/V. 2.Proceed as in Step 2 above.
Hope that helps.

Answer.Content:
Try Paste Special.
In Microsoft Word versions prior to Word 2007:
1.Click the Edit->Paste Special menu item. 2.Select Unformatted Text in the As list box. 3.Click OK.
In Word 2007:
1.Press ALT/CTRL/V. 2.Proceed as in Step 2 above.
Hope that helps.
